properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Chincoteague to Parramore Island VA out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Fenwick Island DE to Chincoteague VA out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 5 at 6:53AM EST until February 7 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 20 kt late this afternoon into
this evening, becoming east then south southeast 10 to 15 kt
tonight into Thursday morning. South or southwest winds 15 to
25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt from late Thursday morning into
Friday afternoon. Seas 5 to 9 ft expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Fenwick Island DE to Chincoteague
VA out 20 nm and Coastal waters from Chincoteague to Parramore
Island VA out 20 nm.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 6 PM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 PM EST FRIDAY
